title: Projects
subtitle: Things I've built
description: Here are some of my recent projects that showcase my skills and experience

taskManagement.title: Task Management System
taskManagement.description: Full-stack team collaboration app with project and task management, real-time SignalR notifications, file attachments, and interactive analytics dashboard.

techbooksStore.title: TechBooks Store
techbooksStore.description: Modern bookstore built with React featuring Google Books API search, shopping cart, Google OAuth authentication, and smooth responsive animations.

quizme.title: QuizMe - Islamic Knowledge Challenge
quizme.description: Interactive Arabic quiz app about Quran, Prophets, and Companions with flip cards, four categories, and beautiful RTL animations.

htmlTemplate03.title: Modern Responsive Landing Page
htmlTemplate03.description: Fully responsive landing page with CSS Grid and Flexbox, featuring animated sections, testimonials, services, and skills showcase.

casperTemplate.title: Casper Creative Template
casperTemplate.description: Pixel-perfect HTML/CSS template with clean modern UI, cross-browser compatibility, and lightweight optimized code.
